author: andrea21z
body:
#### PR description:
- This PR includes the update of the Muon MVA ID working points in MiniAOD and NanoAOD for the latest training. 

- This training is the final and has been published in CMS-PAS-MUO-22-001.

- Related PR: to include the new MVA model in data repository, in .onnx format -> https://github.com/cms-data/RecoMuon-MuonIdentification/pull/9

#### PR validation:
- We check the output of the new branch and Working Points running runTheMatrix and everything looks fine.
- We execute the basic tests  suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Update Muon MVA ID model and working points in MiniAOD and NanoAOD
